statements: SELECT * FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE destination = 'Japan';
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT traveler_name, destination, travel_date FROM solo_travel_trends ORDER BY travel_date DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, destination, travel_purpose FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_purpose LIKE '%vacation%';
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE traveler_name = 'Alice';
SELECT destination, traveler_name FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_purpose LIKE '%adventure%';
SELECT * FROM solo_travel_trends WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(travel_id) AS total_travels, traveler_name FROM solo_travel_trends GROUP BY traveler_name HAVING total_travels > 2;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, age, country_of_origin FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, gender, age, country_of_origin FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, country_of_origin, destination FROM solo_travelers JOIN travel_logs ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = travel_logs.traveler_id;
SELECT traveler_name, age, destination, duration_days FROM solo_travelers JOIN travel_logs ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = travel_logs.traveler_id WHERE duration_days > 5;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, age, country_of_origin FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY age DESC, country_of_origin ASC;
SELECT traveler_id, traveler_name, age FROM solo_travelers WHERE age >= 30 AND country_of_origin='USA';
SELECT destination, duration_days, travel_purpose FROM travel_logs WHERE duration_days > 7 ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT t.traveler_name, l.destination, l.duration_days FROM solo_travelers t INNER JOIN travel_logs l ON t.traveler_id = l.traveler_id WHERE t.country_of_origin != 'Canada';
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers ORDER BY traveler_id DESC;
SELECT traveler_name, travel_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE destination = 'Beach';
SELECT traveler_name, destination, travel_date FROM solo_travelers WHERE travel_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM travel_activities WHERE traveler_id = 1 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, destination FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM travel_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;

SELECT traveler_name, destination, activity_name FROM solo_travelers JOIN travel_activities ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = travel_activities.traveler_id WHERE travel_activities.activity_type = 'Adventure';

SELECT traveler_name, destination, rating FROM solo_travelers JOIN travel_activities ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = travel_activities.traveler_id JOIN travel_ratings ON travel_activities.activity_id = travel_ratings.activity_id WHERE travel_ratings.rating > 4;

SELECT traveler_name, destination, activity_name, rating, review FROM solo_travelers JOIN travel_activities ON solo_travelers.traveler_id = travel_activities.traveler_id JOIN travel_ratings ON travel_activities.activity_id = travel_ratings.activity_id WHERE travel_ratings.review IS NOT NULL ORDER BY travel_ratings.rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers;
SELECT username, age, country_of_origin FROM solo_travelers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trip_id, start_date, end_date FROM solo_trips WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT destination_name, country, rating FROM solo_destinations WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, trip_id, review_text, rating FROM trip_reviews WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM solo_travelers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY country_of_origin ASC, username DESC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM solo_travelers WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trip_id, start_date, end_date, cost FROM solo_trips WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT destination_name, country, region, travel_purpose FROM solo_destinations WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY destination_name ASC;
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM trip_reviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoloTravelers ORDER BY traveler_name ASC;
SELECT traveler_name, age, gender FROM SoloTravelers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT traveler_name, country_of_origin FROM SoloTravelers WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM TravelDestinations WHERE average_rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT destination_name, region, popular_activities FROM TravelDestinations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT traveler_name, age, country_of_origin FROM SoloTravelers WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY traveler_name ASC;
SELECT destination_name, region, popular_activities FROM TravelDestinations WHERE average_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY destination_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM TravelHistory WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY total_duration DESC;

SELECT traveler_name, destination_name, travel_date, total_cost FROM SoloTravelers INNER JOIN TravelHistory ON SoloTravelers.traveler_id = TravelHistory.traveler_id INNER JOIN TravelExpenses ON TravelHistory.history_id = TravelExpenses.history_id WHERE total_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;

SELECT traveler_name, rating, review_text FROM SoloTravelers INNER JOIN TravelHistory ON SoloTravelers.traveler_id = TravelHistory.traveler_id INNER JOIN TravelReviews ON TravelHistory.history_id = TravelReviews.history_id WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
